Translations.Text: Zapamatat Si our servant Zamestnanie he vola sa jeho Lord devil afflicted mna hardship pain
Strike ground tvoj nohy! jaro will dat ona healing pne
My restaurovat jeho rodina for him; dva krat mat rad vela. Such je our zlutovanie; reminder those possess inteligencia
Ihned ona cestovat zem preach odkaz fulfill tvoj zavazok. My zalozit him steadfast. Co dobry servant! He bol submitter
zapamatat si i our servants Abraham Isaac Jacob. They bol resourceful possessed vision
My bestowed them velka zehnat awareness Hereafter
They zvolit si they bol among the vela righteous
Zapamatat Si Ismail Elisha Zal-Kifl; among the vela righteous
This bol reminder righteous zasluzit nadherny destiny
Zahrada Eden robit je otvorene up ich zavora them
Relaxing therein they dat vela laskavy z ovocie pne
They have nadherny spouses
This bol co ona zasluzit Dni Reckoning
Our provisions bol inexhaustible
Mat rad for transgressors they incurred chudobny destiny
Hell bol kde they burn co chudobny abode
co they chut therein bol hellish pne bitter food
vela inak z same laskavy
(This bol zoskupit thrown Hell ona. They nie vitajte residents Hell). They zasluzit burn hellfire
newcomers respond Nor ona vitajte. Ona je the jeden preceded us zmylit us! Therefore suffer this chudobny koniec
They i say Our Lord these je the jeden led us into this; zdvojnasobit retribution hellfire them
(They say "Ako pod my nie see Hell) zaludnit my robit pouzivat pocitat among the zlomyselny
My pouzivat ridicule them; my pouzivat turn our oci z them
This predetermined fact ludia Hell feud 1 iny
